Private Sub Worksheet_Change(ByVal Target As Range)

    If Not Intersect(Range("A10:K30"), Target) Is Nothing Then

    
        Application.ScreenUpdating = False
        Application.DisplayAlerts = False
        Application.Calculation = xlCalculationManual
        Application.Cursor = xlWait
        
        
         'Basic information
     '  Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("A94:L101").Copy
     '  Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("A5:L12").PasteSpecial Paste:=xlPasteValues
        Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("A5:L12").Value = Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("A94:L101").Value
        
      
         'Panels
     '   Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("A105:C162").Copy
     '   Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("A15:C72").PasteSpecial Paste:=xlPasteValues
        Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("b15:C77").Value = Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("b105:C188").Value
        

        'Steel Skid
        'Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("E105:G118").Copy
        'Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("E15:G29").PasteSpecial Paste:=xlPasteValues
        Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("f15:G29").Value = Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("f105:G119").Value
        
        
        'Bolts & Nuts
        'Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("I105:K114").Copy
        'Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("E32:G42").PasteSpecial Paste:=xlPasteValues
        Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("f32:G42").Value = Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("j105:K115").Value
        
        
        'External Reinforcing
        'Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("M105:O117").Copy
        'Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("E45:G57").PasteSpecial Paste:=xlPasteValues
        Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("f45:G59").Value = Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("n105:O119").Value
        
        
        'Internal Reinforcing
        'Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("Q105:S117").Copy
        'Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("E60:G72").PasteSpecial Paste:=xlPasteValues
        Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("f62:G77").Value = Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("r105:S120").Value
        
        
        'Internal Tie-Rod
        'Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("U105:W122").Copy
        'Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("I15:K32").PasteSpecial Paste:=xlPasteValues
        Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("j15:K33").Value = Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("v105:W123").Value
        
        
        
        'ETC
        'Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("Y105:AA124").Copy
        'Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("I36:K57").PasteSpecial Paste:=xlPasteValues
        Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("j36:K57").Value = Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("z105:AA126").Value
        
        
        'Fittings & Sockets
        'Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("AC105:AE115").Copy
        'Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("I59:K73").PasteSpecial Paste:=xlPasteValues
        Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("j60:K77").Value = Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("Ad105:AE122").Value
        
        
        Application.Calculation = xlCalculationAutomatic
        Application.DisplayAlerts = True
        Application.ScreenUpdating = True
        Application.Cursor = xlDefault
     
   End If

End Sub

Private Sub Worksheet_SelectionChange(ByVal Target As Range)

End Sub

Attribute VB_Name = "Module2"
Private Sub SaveWorkbookAsNewFile(NewFileName As String)
    Dim ActSheet As Worksheet
    Dim ActBook As Workbook
    Dim CurrentFile As String
    Dim NewFileType As String
    Dim NewFile As String
 
    Application.ScreenUpdating = False    ' Prevents screen refreshing.

    CurrentFile = ThisWorkbook.FullName
 
    NewFileType = "Excel Files 1997-2003 (*.xls), *.xls," & _
               "Excel Files 2007 (*.xlsx), *.xlsx," & _
               "All files (*.*), *.*"
 
    NewFile = Application.GetSaveAsFilename( _
        InitialFileName:=NewFileName, _
        fileFilter:=NewFileType)
 
    If NewFile <> "" And NewFile <> "False" Then
        ActiveWorkbook.SaveAs Filename:=NewFile, _
            FileFormat:=xlNormal, _
            Password:="", _
            WriteResPassword:="", _
            ReadOnlyRecommended:=False, _
            CreateBackup:=False
 
        Set ActBook = ActiveWorkbook
        Workbooks.Open CurrentFile
        ActBook.Close
    End If
 
    Application.ScreenUpdating = True
End Sub

Private Sub Worksheet_Activate()

Dim rng As Range, cf As Range, table_array As Range
Dim Pallet_max_layer As Long, temp As Long, cnt As Long, temp1 As Long
Dim i As Long, j As Long, k As Long, m As Long, h As Long, a As Long, j1 As Long, h1 As Long, h2 As Long, k2 As Long, k3 As Long, k4 As Long
Dim BnPalletFullflag As Boolean
Dim Exitflag As Integer, bnW1010nos As Integer, bnW1010flag As Integer, bnW0510nos As Integer, bnW0510flag As Integer

Dim BytCurrentPanelLayer As Byte
Dim BytBalancePanelLayer As Byte
Dim strAddr As String
Dim bn2mflag As Boolean, bnW1015flag As Boolean, bnW1020flag As Boolean, intPalletSize As Byte

Dim MaxPalletHeight As Long
Dim varResult As Variant

Exitflag = 0
MaxPalletHeight = 25
BytCurrentPanelLayer = 0

    
Sheets("PRINTOUT(BOM)").Range("B15:C71").Copy
Sheets("PACKING").Range("A4:B60").PasteSpecial xlPasteValues, Operation:=xlPasteSpecialOperationNone

bn2mflag = False


For j = 0 To 210 Step 2
    Range("c3:c60").Offset(0, j).ClearContents
Next j


' lookup»ç¿ë
For i = 0 To 100 Step 2

    For j = 0 To Range("a4", Cells(Rows.Count, "a").End(xlUp)).Cells.Count
          ' P1015ÆÇ³Ú
          If Range("a4").Offset(j, 0).Value Like "PL15**" And Range("a4").Offset(j, i + 1).Value > 0 Then
          
                If Range("a4").Offset(j, i + 1).Value >= MaxPalletHeight Then
                    Do Until Range("a4").Offset(j, i + 1) < MaxPalletHeight
                        Range("a4").Offset(j, i + 2).Value = MaxPalletHeight
                        i = i + 2
                        BytCurrentPanelLayer = 0
                        bnW1015flag = True


                    Loop
                        Range("a4").Offset(j, i + 2).Value = Range("a4").Offset(j, i + 1).Value
                        BytCurrentPanelLayer = BytCurrentPanelLayer + Range("a4").Offset(j, i + 2).Value

                Else
                    If Range("a4").Offset(j, i + 1).Value < MaxPalletHeight Then
                        Range("a4").Offset(j, i + 2).Value = Range("a4").Offset(j, i + 1).Value
                        BytCurrentPanelLayer = BytCurrentPanelLayer + Range("a4").Offset(j, i + 2).Value
                        bnW1015flag = True
                    End If

                End If
          End If
    Next j
    
    
      For j = 0 To Range("a4", Cells(Rows.Count, "a").End(xlUp)).Cells.Count
          ' P1015ÆÇ³Ú
          If Range("a4").Offset(j, 0).Value Like "SL15**" And Range("a4").Offset(j, i + 1).Value > 0 Then
          
                If Range("a4").Offset(j, i + 1).Value >= MaxPalletHeight - BytCurrentPanelLayer Then
                    Do Until Range("a4").Offset(j, i + 1) < MaxPalletHeight - BytCurrentPanelLayer
                        Range("a4").Offset(j, i + 2).Value = MaxPalletHeight - BytCurrentPanelLayer
                        i = i + 2
                        BytCurrentPanelLayer = 0
